ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.2_0: the nun Thullanandā went wandering without first relinquishing her lodging.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.3_0: Soon afterwards her lodging caught fire.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.8_0: She’ll just make us responsible for whatever is burnt.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.9_0: When Thullanandā returned to her lodging, she asked the nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.10_0: “Venerables, I hope you removed my things?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.13_0: “How can the nuns not remove the contents when a lodging is burning?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.14_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.15_0: “How could Venerable Thullanandā go wandering without relinquishing her lodging?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.16_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.19_0: “... How could the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.20_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.21_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:1.22.1_0: ‘If a nun goes wandering without relinquishing her lodging, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.6_0: one with a door is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.8_0: if she crosses the boundary of an enclosed lodging without first relinquishing it to a nun, a trainee nun, or a novice nun, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.1.9_0: If she goes beyond the vicinity of an unenclosed lodging, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.1_0: If it has not been relinquished, and she perceive that it has not, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.2_0: If it has not been relinquished, but she is unsure of it, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.3_0: If it has not been relinquished, but she perceives that it has, and she goes, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.4_0: If she does not relinquish a lodging without a door, and then goes, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.5_0: If it has been relinquished, but she does not perceive that it has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.6_0: If it has been relinquished, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.2.7_0: If it has been relinquished, and she perceives that it has, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.2_0: if she relinquishes it and then goes;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.4_0: if she searches, but is unable to find anyone to relinquish it to;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.6_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.8_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:2.3.9_0: The eighth rule, the training rule on weavers, is finished.
